response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $9,500. This represents a significant savings and a unique chance to secure such a valuable asset at a reduced cost. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 9500}
